activities: Zuberance collects and processes online customer data and personal information including names, usernames and email addresses in order to enable users to publicly post reviews about a product or service to third party websites.  Such information is passed along to the company that has provided the product and/or service reviewed.
personaldata: Names, usernames and email addresses are processed.  In some instances, data may be manually processed.
recoursemech: Privacy concerns may be raised by contacting privacy@zuberance.com.  The individual's account will be immediately disabled and processing of such individual's information will cease pending review and resolution.  Zuberance is committed to working with the appropriate regulatory agencies including EU Data Protection Authorities.
